  • Method Details

    • updateSaveOnClick

      void updateSaveOnClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method saves the customer to the database, and directs back to the 'CUSTOMERS' screen. It gives errors if invalid data is entered.
      Parameters:
      event - clicking the save button.
      Throws:
      IOException - The exception that will be thrown in an error.

    • updateCancelOnClick

      void updateCancelOnClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method cancels updating the customer, and directs back to the 'CUSTOMERS' screen.
      Parameters:
      event - clicking the cancel button.
      Throws:
      IOException - The exception that will be thrown in an error.

    • onUpdateDivision

      void onUpdateDivision(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method determines the content of the divisions label and populates the divisions combobox, based on the country combobox selection.
      Parameters:
      event - making a selection in the country combobox.

    • sendCustomer

      public void sendCustomer(Customers customer)
      This method sends the customer that is selected in the customer table in the 'VIEW CUSTOMERS' screen to the 'UPDATE CUSTOMERS' screen.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to send

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method initializes the 'ADD CUSTOMER' screen. It populates the country combobox.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - the location.
      resourceBundle - the resources.
